description:
Live Show Mondays brings you part 3 of the May live show that featured Dana DeArmond, Busty Nika Noire and special guest co-top Ariel X.
Ok, it's really part 2 because we messed up the order last week, but who cares? We have two hot girls suffering in metal bondage. Dana is put on a brutal device and impaled with a huge dildo. Ariel X then makes her cum over and over, while the new girl watches in mute horror. Then we drag both girls out and spread them out standing. Whip and tickle is just one of the torments they must endure, as 3 Tops brutalize both girls. Lots of emotions, lots of orgasms, lots of screaming!
title: Dana DeArmond, Nika Noire and Ariel X Part 3 of 4 of the May Live Feed
